name: Hex-Bert
description:
Play either Crystal or Blob and dominate the field.  

If you start as server without a second player, you'll play against a (very poor) AI.

Click and drag to move.  Moving to higher altitude is costly and may just destroy the unit if its not starting in a strong enough position.

Moving onto an enemy initiates an attack.  You can move multiple times up to the normal limit of movement to stack the attack.

There is currently no good solution to stalemates.  Leave a comment if you have an idea.
